title: Earbuds are a recurring cost that you’re not prepared for
description: Most earbuds don't last beyond two years, and we're not talking about that enough when recommending expensive earbuds.

title: Someone tell Motorola NFC is an essential feature
description: Motorola thinks a 2MP macro camera is more important than contactless payments and public transport.

title: Oura Ring vs Whoop: A faceless fitness tracker face off
description: Without displays on the table, we dig into these two brands' major differences.
